title: AI Engineer - Machine Learning (contract)
description: Our team seeks a Machine Learning Engineer to advance the development and improvement of our software foundation and tools vital for training state-of-the-art AI models. Your role will be centered on creating strong, scalable, and efficient training infrastructures and frameworks facilitating the full spectrum of the machine learning process, from handling data to deploying models. In collaboration with researchers and software engineers, you'll ensure that training systems are smoothly integrated and functioning, expanding the limits of AI's capabilities, especially in practical robotics scenarios.
requirements: BS, MS or higher degree in Computer Science, Robotics, Engineering or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
Proficiency in Python, C++, or similar and at least one deep learning library such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX, etc.
Strong background in distributed computing, parallel processing techniques, handling large-scale datasets and data preprocessing.
Deep understanding of state-of-the-art machine learning techniques and models.
Experience with cloud-based training environments (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure).
Experience in developing and maintaining software tooling and infrastructure for machine learning.
Deep understanding and practical experience with software engineering principles, including algorithms, data structures, and system design.
Experience with continuous integration and automated testing frameworks.
matchReason: The candidate's profile indicates a focus on presales, sales, or solutions engineering roles, which are primarily customer-facing and involve understanding client needs, demonstrating product capabilities, and providing technical solutions. In contrast, the job posting is for an AI Engineer specializing in machine learning, which requires a strong technical background in developing and improving AI models, software infrastructure, and handling large-scale data. The candidate's experience does not align with the technical and development-focused nature of this role. Additionally, the job is a contract position based in Redmond, WA, with no mention of hybrid or remote work options, which may not meet the candidate's preference for flexible work arrangements. While both the candidate and the job are within the AI and technology sectors, the specific skills and role focus differ significantly, resulting in a low match score.

title: Generative AI Engineer
description: We’re seeking an AI Engineer (Gen AI) that shares the same passion in building enterprise-level SaaS products that integrate with cutting edge AI technologies. Responsibilities include contributing to Zest AI’s GenAI SaaS product, leading research initiatives, writing production code in Python, and collaborating with a cross-functional team. The role requires a strong background in modular/modern OOP software design, analytical skills, and familiarity with GenAI applications.
requirements: A minimum of a Master’s degree in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, etc.) preferred
Strong experience with modular/modern OOP software design using Python
Strong analytical skills and proficiency with using Pandas, Numpy, etc.
Familiarity with source version control software, e.g., Git
Strong statistical and analytical knowledge
Knowledge and experience with GenAI applications (agentic framework, RAG, prompt engineering, etc.) is a strong plus
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Established computer science fundamentals in data structures and algorithms
Passionate about GenAI

companyInfo.description: Founded in 2009, Zest AI is a leader in financial technology, providing AI tools to create a more resilient US financial system. The company focuses on expanding credit access and improving lending experiences through AI technology.

benefits: Robust medical, dental and vision insurance plans
Winter break (office closed between Christmas and New Year's Day)
Generous family leave policy (12 week maternity leave / 6 week paternity leave)
Phone, internet, wellness, and professional development allowances
Employee gatherings, including Town Hall meetings
Complimentary manicures, pedicures, and mindfulness sessions
Company happy hours, social events, outings
matchReason: The candidate has experience in engineering roles with a focus on AI and agentic AI solutions, which aligns with the job's requirement for knowledge and experience with GenAI applications. However, the candidate is seeking roles in presales, sales, or solutions engineering, which differ significantly from the responsibilities of the Generative AI Engineer position that focuses on building enterprise-level SaaS products, leading research initiatives, and writing production code. The job requires strong experience in modular/modern OOP software design using Python, which is not explicitly mentioned in the candidate's profile. Additionally, the candidate's preference for roles in presales or solutions engineering suggests a focus on client interaction and solution delivery rather than the technical development and research focus required by the job. The job's location in Burbank, CA, and the lack of explicit mention of hybrid, remote, or flexible work arrangements further reduce the match score, as the candidate's preferences for work/life balance and flexibility are not addressed.

title: Machine Learning Engineer with Generative AI
description: We seek a forward-thinking Machine Learning Engineer with a deep focus on Generative AI technologies within the Azure ecosystem. This pivotal role is dedicated to pioneering AI-driven solutions, mainly to deploy a state-of-the-art chatbot crafted through the Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technique to analyze and interpret customer reviews. The successful candidate will also craft an insightful analytical dashboard powered by Azure OpenAI. The successful candidate will be instrumental in harnessing the power of generative AI to revolutionize our customer interaction and data analysis methodologies.
requirements: 12+ years of experience
Proven expertise in integrating and leveraging Azure cloud services
Proficient in Python and Spark
Foundation in Machine Learning and NLP
Demonstrated ability to design and operationalize scalable data pipelines within Databricks
benefits: Opportunities to grow in the Information technology world
matchReason: The candidate's profile indicates a focus on presales, sales, or solutions engineering roles, which are distinct from the technical and development-oriented responsibilities of a Machine Learning Engineer. While both the job and the candidate are involved in AI, the job requires deep technical expertise in Generative AI, Azure cloud services, Python, Spark, and Databricks, which are not mentioned in the candidate's profile. Additionally, the job requires 12+ years of experience, which is not specified in the candidate's profile. The job does not mention any hybrid, remote, or flexible work arrangements, which are priorities for the candidate. Therefore, there is a significant mismatch in terms of role focus, technical requirements, and work arrangement preferences.
